Name: La Fuga
About the game: Graphic isometric adventure where you assume the role of a prisoner awaiting sentencing. This will be in seven days and you must find a way to escape. If they condemn you, they will transfer you to a maximum security penitentiary, and you will end up with your bones in jail forever. The days pass and you run out of time. Ask, question, locate, change, steal ... do whatever it takes to escape. Do not miss daily tasks so they do not suspect. Beware of night surveillance cameras. Any favor will benefit you.
